Reviews.Title: “I doubt on reviewing Angel's home”
Reviews.Author: pkldeknsq
Reviews.Content: we visited Angel's home with a group of friends. We got a very beautiful and clean room, top-located near the highlights of Istanbul. The staff is very friendly and helpfull. But there is a great difference between the rooms, for the same price. Some are beautiful renovated, other aren't. The staff is helpfull, and gave us a lot of information. Most of them were very good, but don't go to the fish restaurant they advice: it's an awful place, expensive, and we left hungry.

Reviews.Title: “3BR Flat a great pitstop for whirlwind tour of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: willijr
Reviews.Content: Some friends and I just returned home after an exceedingly brief stay in Istanbul--basically an extended, 24 hour layover while en route from Central Asia. We needed a place for an economical overnight stay in the heart of Sultanahmet in order to maximize our limited time. We reserved the separate "3 Bedroom" apartment, which is three blocks (4 minute walk) away, and thoroughly enjoyed it. I say "3 BR" because one of the beds is actually in a recessed corner of the main living room. It is next to the streetfront window and the streetlight inevitably shines through the rather flimsy shade. That being said, an eye visor minimized the effects of the light pollution and there was actually very little noise other than the early morning call to prayer. In fact, we loved the "lived in" (barbershop, feral cats and all!) ambience of the little side street which felt away from the tourist crowds but close enough to easily walk to the Aya Sofia or Blue Mosque within 5-10 minutes. Overall, the apartment worked great for our party of 5, with two of us sharing the large bed in the living room, two others in twins in one bedroom and one other in the queen in the second bedroom. The apartment was clean and neat. The wireless worked in the evening, but did not work in the morning for some reason. The hotel itself was very neat and offered a delicious breakfast in the dining room. Due to weather considerations, they have not started serving on the rooftop terrace yet, but we did escape up there with some coffee for some terrific ocean (and Blue Mosque) views before we had to leave. The staff spoke decent English and were very helpful in arranging a great local color restaurant reservation and driver in the Punkapi (fish market) district. They also kept an eye on our luggage for us at the main hotel reception and loaned me an adaptor for the power cord on my laptop. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay at the Angel's Home. If you've got a party of 4-6, and like to step outside the box a little, the apartment is a particularly attractive deal.

Reviews.Title: “A group of biker friends stayed”
Reviews.Author: pia z
Reviews.Content: We were a gropup of bikers stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in april. All the hotels around were full , prices high in eastern. One night we found a place in a pension then moved to Angelshome. Big difference. Hair dryer, mini refrigerator, screen tv, ac, sleepers and bathrobes , fully equipped toiletiers we luxury for bikers as were :) but good for others travellers. We had to keep our budget anyway non chance to stay somewhere else during that period. We were so satisfied with Angelshome staff, service. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: “The right place to stay, hi guys”
Reviews.Author: andrea d
Reviews.Content: My wife choosed this hotel by TA , many good reviews about it. Almost all were ok. The rooms might be bit larger but if compare with other european cith hotels it was good enough. Breakfast was excellent. Many choices as eggs, flower tea bags , consantrated juices and many others. The place were the hotel was so good. some hundred metters from main atraction for tourists and this is good to save the time. view from the teraace was perfect. Personal were all so friendly and helpful that was unsual to see it in european city hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely in with good location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: paplo c
Reviews.Content: Yesss, this is the hotel i would stay again. Absolutely recommend to all people visit Istanbul. Nice rooms , very good breakfast , very friendly personal Best Location. Taksim area is very easy to go by tram, grand bazaar by walk, Istanbul by Asia some minutes to frerry. The rest are minutes to the hotel only. Free transportation and 24 hrs free wireless internet connection was i liked too much 10% cash discount was also bonus for our stay :))

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location i have seen ever”
Reviews.Author: anreodetti s
Reviews.Content: Only a stone thrown away from the place.Nice view throgh to bosphorus and Blue Mosque from the roof top terrace.I hope the breakfast serving in summer there. Selami the junior boss :) was so kind and helpfull to us. Run the hotel as professionaly as could be. Personal of the hotel all were so friendly. Karina serves the breakfast was so possitive for all time. The 3 guys at the reception desk were always ready for any information. Yes the place where the hotel located just perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: fredrico f
Reviews.Content: Just back from Istanbul. What a great city it was and also the hotel we stayed was perfect with its location. It was located only some steps away from Ayasofia and Blumosque. Main points for tourists are easy reachable. The hotel staff was so friendly and helpfull. good service, reasonable rate, delicious breakfast and free wireless internet collection with this lovely in. Rooms were clean, equipped with sleepers,bathrobe, a.c and also free tea - coffee bags with kettle. Higly recommend Angels Home and definetly will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay, Nice Staff”
Reviews.Author: Paul F
Reviews.Content: Clean, good location, walking distance to most sites. Staff extremely friendly and helpful. Would stay here again. Showing its age (wallpaper) and a little quirky (sheets), but it looks like they are working on fixing it up.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect . Central yet away from noise”
Reviews.Author: magyarkiz
Reviews.Content: Two ladies travelling alone. Staff courteous, rooms clean, breakfast great. Real TUrkish tea which seems to be dying out in hotels . Coffee was fabulous too. They even served soup which is traditional during Turkish winters. The staff really seem to care. Re location. Wonderfully located at the edge of the old city wall. A little walk up the road into the Arasta Bazaar and up stairs to the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofya, trams Topkapi etc. totally recommend this hotel. If the rest of mt reviews are read you will see i'm very fussy

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay in hotel Angels home”
Reviews.Author: bente g
Reviews.Content: Our first but not last stay in Istanbul and in Hotel Angels home. We liked the service from the staff very much, we stayed three persons in a clean trippel room, enough space for all of us even with a teenager. Very good breakfast and even birthcake as a surprise from the staff. This hotel is situateded just perfect and the area is quiet and charming. Around the corner we recommend the barber and the restaurant Tria Elegance. Bente and Arild.

Reviews.Title: “What a nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alexandra F
Reviews.Content: This was my 4th trip to Istanbul and my second stay at this hotel. If you like to stay in Sultanahmet it is perfect. The rooms are clean and big.The breakfast is fine and the whole staff is very friendly. I hope to come back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect little haven”
Reviews.Author: TheLadyBackpackers
Reviews.Content: This hotel is an amazing find. Everything about it is 5 star. We would have no hesitation in recommending it and will definitely come back to it.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: willowcat95
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel for those looking for a hotel with great value. It's a basic hotel with bed and breakfast, no fancy pools or gyms. The hotel is very conveniently located in Sultanhamet, the old section of the city, within walking distance to major attractions, such as the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, or the Topkapi Palace. The Spice Market and the Grand Bazaar are are only two tram stations away. There are restaurants and shops right in the immediate area, as well as a very nice bazaar. The room was very clean and had everything we needed. The only very minor problem we had was the water pressure in the bathroom sink being a bit low, but otherwise, the room was very comfortable, with free wifi, flat screen T.V., and complimentary tea and coffee in the room, slippers and bathrobes. Breakfast was very good and had lots of hot and cold choices. The staff was very friendly and very helpful. The pick up and drop off service to and from the airport was very appreciated. We will certainly be back, as we fell in love with Istanbul, and Angel's Hotel made our stay even better.

Reviews.Title: “best vacation ever!”
Reviews.Author: Maryam A
Reviews.Content: first I came to angle home hotel 2 years ago. we had a very nice time in this hotel with such a friendly stuffs. they are so that you feel you are at your home. this year on Feb 17th 2012 I came back again with my friend. I was so worry because of my friend. she did not know about the hotel. it was her first time. they gave us the best room and treated us like a member of our family. whenever my friend and I went out and wanted to come back my friend told me, "lets go home" yes, the hotel was comfortable, neat and warm like a home. I thank all of the member of angle hotels stuffs who were so so understanding and kind to us.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to be based in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: hanfan07
Reviews.Content: Our experience at Angels Home was a good one. Nice rooms and friendly staff. Location is excellent for visiting all the major sights although very touristy area, so make sure you venture out to other areas of the city. Overall good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “2nd visit to Angel's Home”
Reviews.Author: joisEdinburgh
Reviews.Content: Just returned yesterday from another great stay at Angel's Home. First time was at their other hotel which has now been sold but I have to say the second one is much better and the facilities are first class. Very clean rooms , with good facilities, eg/ flat screen tv, slippers, tea and coffee making, plenty hot water and cosy warm bedrooms. Nice and quiet at night too. Would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel due to its ideal position to Akyibik street with plenty of restaurants to choose from and close proximity to the Blue Mosque and Sultanahmet Square. Also praise for the staff who were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stefanie E
Reviews.Content: This hotel is really great. The rooms are clean and very nice. The staff is absolutely awesome. They do their utmost to help you have an unforgettable time in Istanbul. The area the hotel is situated in is very good. The Hagia Sofia and the Blue Mosque are approximately 3 minutes away. A small Bazar and the Mosaic Museum are right behind the hotel. The tram no 1 is also next to the hotel the station is Sultanahmet, the tram gets you through the complete city. Around the hotel there a plenty of restaurants. I can really highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Worth for the money”
Reviews.Author: Aapo S
Reviews.Content: This hotel is exactly what they promised to be. Very nice and helpful staff. Location is superb, it couldn't been better! Thanks a lot, I will definitely recommend this to my friends!

Reviews.Title: “Good budget hotel that tries hard”
Reviews.Author: AMHelmy
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a night. Hotel is clean, very conveniently located and the staff are charming. Facilities are all in working order, though a little exhausted. Breakfast can do with more freshness and variety, but otherwise edible (not that you'd run out of choices with neighbouring restaurants and cafes).

Reviews.Title: “best hotel in Istanbul!”
Reviews.Author: Nasser I
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a hotel in Istanbul then look no further. This is the ideal place for you to spend your holidays. The location is brilliant. its within walking distance from the sea, the grand bazaar, the blue mosque and Topkapi Palace. The rooms are luxurious, secure, clean and come with a safe and a great view. Breakfast is inclusive and the food is great. However, the best part is the service. The staff are friendly and eager to help. They will help arrange any trip or activity you wish, free of charge. They will deal with any inconvenience you have to an excellent standard and will help you in whatever way necessary. Trust me; this is the perfect holiday.. the location is brilliant, the accommodation is excellent and the the service& staff are memorable!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: Joyful_Sasha
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days. What we liked: Great location, just a minute walk to all historical attractions and restaurants. Great â€œall you can eatâ€� breakfast with different varieties of dishes and very caring personal. Chef Karina was great! What we did not like: First of all, do not trust pictures that are in their web site or in the trip adviser site, they are all deluxe rooms that you have to pay more for. Regular rooms are small and have no view. The last but most important: avoid room 101!!! This is the smallest room Iâ€™ve ever stayed in! The room was of a size of a Quinn bed. So you feel like you are sleeping in the closet. If you have chance grab room 104, itâ€™s much much bigger and nicer and it goes for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Amar I
Reviews.Content: The typical view of a hotel is; there's a bell boy who carries your bags and a check in desk. but at angels home it was a lot more than that. the staff are good hearted, They arranged days out for our group free of charge, They would order food for us on a regular basis. the whole duration of the trip they were nothing but kind hearted. The Turkish truly are very hospitable people. I would like to thank Baris Kaan and Eren for the around the clock assistance. the hotel accomodation was amazing for Â£12 pound a night pp. We had a flat, which was very chic and clean. The breakfast was out of this world. For any body that is in two minds about this hotel; take my word for it and choose this hotel and i am positive that you will enjoy your stay here, without a shadow of doubt. not forgetting this hotel is literally 3-4 mins walk from down and all the major historical buildings. once again thank you Angel's Home Hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good place for good price”
Reviews.Author: Sergei_Truschev
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff. Stable WiFi in the rooms. Nice and clean bathroom. We were in December, the room was very warm. The big breakfast. Located in the historic center in a very nice area. Daily maid service.

Reviews.Title: “muchas gracias”
Reviews.Author: klaus b
Reviews.Content: thanks to the very friendly staff- you are all angels- especially the breakfast angel Karina. you were very well looking after us!

Reviews.Title: “Good reliable little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shazzer123
Reviews.Content: We had a good stay at Angel's home hotel. It was clean, helpful, and comfortable and does the job in the tourist trap that is Sultanahmet. Very conveniently located to the Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Great vacation”
Reviews.Author: selcuk B
Reviews.Content: I have stayed one week at the angels home hotel in a standard room. I must say that the room was very clean the staff was very helpful and friendly. It was also cheaper then the other hotels. It was like a gift, Nice room, great service and cheap. I had an great vacation so thank you Angel`s Home Hotel

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: turquie i
Reviews.Content: Trip in december 2011 at Istanbul, booking from opodo. The hotel was perfectly located and we spent a wonderful week visiting Istanbul the magnificent. The room was very comfortable, clean and well decorated, we also appreciated the breakfast and the transfer facility from the airport. It was for us a peaceful and a lovely place to stay. The hotel was welcoming and we felt like at home, the staff at the hotel was warm, smiling, friendly and attentive. I recommend !

Reviews.Title: “"Fantastic Hotel"”
Reviews.Author: Ahmed q
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel, right in the heart of Istanbul, Staff were very friendly and accommodating The place was perfect. reasonable price. Room was clean. Breakfast was very good. I enjoyed my time at the Angel hotel and would definitely come again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Dario F
Reviews.Content: I was there in December for on night. A very good hotel. The room was very clean, spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was also very good. The staff was very helpful. Excellent position, very close to the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. I would stay there again and definitely recommend Angel's Home Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location, friendly staff and clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Roger C
Reviews.Content: Firstly, thanks to Sami at the Angel's Home Hotel for his friendliness. Secondly, thanks generally to the staff at the hotel for making me and my girlfriend's trip an enjoyable one. The room was tidied and cleaned once a day and the staff were helpful and friendly at all times. The breakfast was substantial and eclectic, whilst the decorum was pleasant and the wifi extremely useful. The location of the hotel, within a couple of tens of metres of the Blue Mosque, made exploring the old town easy, whilst its nearness to a tram stop made travelling to the rest of the city very convenient. The only drawbacks were the smell of smoke in the hallways occasionally (but not in the rooms) and the slightly small bedroom. Considering the affordable price, however, I felt the latter of these points was hardly surprising, and didn't inconvenience us in the least. Thanks Angel's Home Hotel for a brilliant city break!

Reviews.Title: “Yess”
Reviews.Author: Elle G
Reviews.Content: It was very relaxing. I enjoyed the clean rooms and they have a very good cleaningservice. The staff by the way is really kind. Breakfast was amazing the best beginning of the day!!! It was a very succesful trip. I really recommend people to stay at the Angel's Home Hotel, if you like your trip to be everything you expected or even better!!

Reviews.Title: “Angel's Home for your enjoyable stay!”
Reviews.Author: h s
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Angel's Home Hotel was for a weekend we choose for the 'de luxe' room.I can say that the rooms are verry nice/clean, good location. The breakfast is excellent. Hotel managers continaully improve the level of service. It's a very well equiped hotel with wel informed and pleasant staff. I certainly stay there again and also recommend others..

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Hosseinzt
Reviews.Content: I was in this hotel between 6-11 Dec 2011. The place was perfect. Fees are very fair. Room was clean. Staff were kind. Breakfast was very good. I enjoyed this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, comfortable, and appreciated”
Reviews.Author: Deadre A
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night awaiting my flight connection. The hotel was a little ways from the airport. The taxi driver charged me 40 lira, which wasn't bad. However, the hotel is small but very clean and the rooms were comfortable with all amenities. The reception was wonderful. The workers were very helpful and kind. Many shops and restaurants in walking distant. Free wireless internet service. The taxi was on time to bring me to the airport. There's free breakfast on the main floor. I didn't have time to stay for breakfast but the eating area was very clean. For the price, my stay was wonderful and would stay there again as well as recommend others.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Pakoo
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, very friendly staff, good location, very clean, a must to visit

Reviews.Title: “Trivsamt, hjÃ¤lpsamt och tryggt”
Reviews.Author: Eva S
Reviews.Content: After nine days at Angel's home Hotel - or rather, at their second hotel, 50 m down the street, I can only say that I'm more than pleased! Two blocks from the Blue Mosque it was very convenient, also close to Tram. Hotel personal always helpful, with a smile and with competence. Be sure, thou, if you deal with Euro or Lira, and when they help and get information, ask to get it written down. Staf in reception are pretty fluent in English. Clean and pretty, daily service, coffe, tea, cattle and water in every room. Breakfast rich and plenty - even thou some of us preferred not to eat fresch sallad and fruits, thinking of turist-stomach. Personally I find the Turkisch breakfast very sweet - but every day complemented with more european eggs, salami, fried vegetables. The "dot over i" was when they informed that they share the tip equally! Not as many other hotels - that higher personal receive larger share. No problems, prices clear and correct, and, for the standard, low, at this nice little hotel. (we payed in advance, and as a group collected a good tip before departure - they are worth it! ) Eva

Reviews.Title: “Nice and helpful staff - always available”
Reviews.Author: alfapetter
Reviews.Content: Broad and varied breakfast buffet, with everything from unknown vegetables and hot peppers to scrambled eggs and muesli. The roof terrace was basic in standard, but usable both indoors and outdoors, and with a view of the sea. Rooms are cosy with all you need.

Reviews.Title: “Angel's Home Hotel - Not a Home for Angels!”
Reviews.Author: Rinat G
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my boyfriend for a few nights in August. It was our first time in Istanbul, and location was important to us so we chose this hotel as it had reasonable prices and was within walking distance to Aya Sophia, the Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar. From that perspective, the hotel was perfect as all these attractions are only a 5 minute walk uphill. The hotel itself is on a small quiet street in a neighborhood filled with smaller hotels. There is no lobby or main room when you first enter - instead you walk through a restaurant and are checked in by a main over a cash register. Be careful about how many suitcases you bring! There is no elevator, and all the rooms are located high up a windy staircase. The rates were reasonable, however we definitely expected clean and presentable rooms (according to the website). Unfortunately this was not the case! Our room was furnished with comforter etc. from the 1970s, that may not have been washed since then. Several appliances in the hotel (including the showerhead) fell apart when you touched them. Besides the considerable dust and general feeling of non-cleanliness, the ceiling was low and you had to stoop to stand in certain parts of the room. The room did feature a balcony, but it was right next to a huge exhaust fan and was also dirty so we could not make use of it. Other amenities in the room include a flatscreen TV with general news channels and bottled water with broken seals.There is no breakfast available. We did not try the restaurant as we were not impressed with the hotel. I would not recommend this hotel, as just by walking around we saw many other establishments at a higher quality level at the same price level. It was dirty and and inconvenient for anyone to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort!!”
Reviews.Author: Alanell
Reviews.Content: I have been to Netherlands; Portugal; UK; USA; and Libya. I can honestly say that I have never felt comfortable and happy like I felt in Istanbul; and never felt hospitality and comfort like I felt in room 301 - Angels' home hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Biker friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: ivan i
Reviews.Content: A group of friends styed at Angelshome for 3 nights in september.It was really crowded time andwe paid more then it worth but it was our fault not to check the date to go to istanbul.All the hotels even guest houses were full and the prices were as in a 5 star hotel in bulgaria.We wer lucy that a turkish biker friend found Angelshome.The owner was also a biker and had good advices from him.The city is amazing but hetraffic was awful although we were with bikes.It is hrd to liv in this city. The rooms were good, comfortable and the hotl was very near the main attractions.The are was so safe and quite.If your rooms is face to the street then u may wake up with a truck noise cleaning thestreets early in the morning and sure the call pray evry morning before sun burns. lso there is safe parking for bikes and limitd number of cars. Th staff of the hotel is very friendly.We will cetanly advice th hotel as our group individualy or to our biker frinds. note:good discount for early bookings :)

Reviews.Title: “Hearing the heart beat ,perfect location”
Reviews.Author: bulgaritiger
Reviews.Content: The hotel i stayed has realy perfect location as a cith hotel. The buildings with this hotel' eco part called peripetie and deluxe part with rooftop that the breakfast serving.And a very usefull advice that if u book in high season there is very small difference betwen eco and deluxe rate but big difference for the room quality.it wll be better to check | compare the room rates for a week ago or later.might be big difference. :) Also regulat shuttle service to the airport is available from the hotel with a very rasonable rate but u can get it from the travel agencies around the hotel (same price ) The hotel itself is located at the heart of the old town' few meters to blue mosque that wakes u up with call prayer every morning.. very early morning :) before the sun burns.It is the same for all hotels around :) do not complain about it.

Reviews.Title: “"Excellent choice when you visit Istanbul"”
Reviews.Author: Bruno336
Reviews.Content: The hotel is placed on a great location for everybody who visit Istanbul - you can walk to the most attractive location and public transportation is also near. We come with motor bike from Croatia (Opatija) and I definitely reccomend this hotel to everybody for many reasons: owner is a biker also and extremely helpful and with his friendly stuff they make a great atmosphere in the hotel, you have free and safe parking in front of te hotel, clean rooms, very good breakfast in the morning on the roof of the hotel, excellent price,...

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Josip B
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend slept one night in this hotel on our way to Iran. It's a very nice place to stay if you want to visit Istanbul. You can walk to the main attractions, Blue Mosque and Ayasofya. Owner is a biker also, and you can park your motorcycles in front of the hotel. We had really great time there, nice clean rooms, friendly stuff for a reasonable price. Best thing for me was breakfast on the roof terrace of the hotel with a beautiful view on the sea.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel at a very reasonable rate”
Reviews.Author: vogel8062
Reviews.Content: We have just stayed 4 nights at this hotel and loved it. It is close to everything in the old city and no need to use local transportation. Lots of restaurants and shops in the area as well. The staff was extremely helpful and always ready to provide help. Breakfast was good with everything you need to start your day, Rooms are small but comfortable. We would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “what a perfect place with its new rooms.”
Reviews.Author: umut b
Reviews.Content: Me and my partner were the first stayers at the new added rooms to Angel's Home.That was great. :) using the bed, shower, and all.The staff of the hotel were all friendly and helpfull.Breakfast was at the roof top.Having the perfect view of Marmara sea and the islands.The locatios could not be better for a hotel.only some steps away from the main attractions. definetly i recommend this lovely gem.

Reviews.Title: “decent hotel, need renovation”
Reviews.Author: Beach2323
Reviews.Content: this hotel is almost a decent rate hostal seems like 2 stars or one star..is a old house and the price is the standar, the ubication is excellent for walk and tourist around, good for the first time for bagpackers and really tourists, they show you a poor room and later you have to upgrade, but well is not a budget hotel but is ok, good for couples and bagpackers, no for family with kids, not for come back

Reviews.Title: “Nowhere may have better location....”
Reviews.Author: burkor
Reviews.Content: Perfecy location.excactly it is perfect.Only and only a stone throw away distance.Waiking up with the great call prayer.I recommend this lovely gem.

Reviews.Title: “we have stayed at this impressive located hotel Angel's home”
Reviews.Author: host67
Reviews.Content: Just some days ago we have stayed at this impressive located hotel Angel's home is only some steps away from the heart of thousands of years smelling history. The view where the breakfast is serving ,from the roof top is great.We have stayed at Penthouse with the view of the bosphorus from the balcony of the room.Staff helpfull and very friendly.No hessitate to contact.All are ready to assist. Absolutely be back to the great city , sure stay at ANGEL's HOME HOTEL SULTANAHMET.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: notime1905
Reviews.Content: We have found this hotel by the way of tripadvisor and aslo by their facebook page. The hotel was also great with its location at the historical peninsula of the old city and we enjoyed Angel's Home breakfast service on the terrace with a wonderful sea view. Room was very well.. Hope to be there again.. Thanks all...

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: qwertymnbvcx
Reviews.Content: Stayed there a couple of days in June 2011. Very good value for money. Great compliment to breakfast staff who did their very best to make you feel welcome. Hotel is recommendable. Hotel is centrally located, situated in an amazingly quiet neighbourhood near Blue Mosque and Aya Sofia.

Reviews.Title: “I advice ANGEL'S HOME”
Reviews.Author: sukook
Reviews.Content: What a nice hotel we stayed.The location is enough to choose the hotel.It is certainly perfect.Only some meters away from BLUE MOSQUE ,AYASOFYA and al others.Also great view from the terrace the breakfast is serving.Free parking , free internet is also available.The rooms are (standard) equipped with all you may need. The owners of the hotel and the staff are realyy so friendly and helpfull.Get assist city information and directions. i advice the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best room to propose”
Reviews.Author: daliyildirim
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend both are Turkish and live in Istanbul but we wanted to have a special place to share and declare our proposal. We chose Angel's Home Beautifull room. It was a reaaly great plece to have your romance within the heart of uniqe Istanbul. Hoping to stay for the beginning of our honeymoon as well. Thank you Hakan and all the friendly Staff.

Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel”
Reviews.Author: lkbparis
Reviews.Content: Angel's home is in an excellent location for sightseeing in Istanbul, just a few minutes walk from the Blue Mosque. The rooms are clean, spacious and affordable with modern bathrooms and a delightful rooftop terrace for breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: engeng65
Reviews.Content: The hotel was booked by my partner for the rest of my business trip to istanbul. The city was great.The hotel was also great with its location.I will be back with my wife but not for business.Ther 2nd trip will be for discover the history of the city and enjoy Angel's Home breakfast service on the terrace. Thanks to the partner who found the hotel and thanks to Angel's Home hotel staff who made my stay enjoable. Hope see all soon.

Reviews.Title: “A dot makes big difference.”
Reviews.Author: fonari69
Reviews.Content: I have found this hotel (angel's home) by TA. Many good reviews about it.But the taxi driver took me to Angelos home then found the correct hotel ANGEL'S HOME that i booked. A dot makes big difference. :) Angel's Home is at the heart of Sultanahmet which is only some steps away from BLUE MOSQUE also called Sultanahmet.Before having booked, it would be better to check the location and correct adress.

Reviews.Title: “We will certainly recommend to all our fellows”
Reviews.Author: seldansel
Reviews.Content: I found everything I could ask for in a hotel in Angel's Home hotel.. You're both a great need for cleaning nd location. terrace, perfect for serving breakfast to spend also the rest of the time. We will certainly recommend to all our fellows who ask to come to this beautiful city.

Reviews.Title: “Really a very beautiful city hotel”
Reviews.Author: 63pukay21
Reviews.Content: Really a very beautiful city hotel.personel very friendly and sincere. Full equipped, including the rooms have aircondition and minibar. breakfast terrace of the hotel are given and the landscape are amazing. 'll stay in this hotel again should I go to Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Be sure if your hotel is Angel's home-Sultanahmet”
Reviews.Author: ozycem
Reviews.Content: I found the hotel on tripadvisor.The reviews were possitive and the price of the hotel was reasonable.Sure the location was the main reason to choÄ±ose Angel's HOme-Sultanahmet. Got a taxi just after going out of the airport terminal.It was very strange because the taxi took me to Angelos Home hotel.Also i was suprised because it was not the hotel i have choosed.The name was almost similir but not the location and not the hotel pictures.Anyway the Angelos Home helped me to find Angelos home. also i was surprised becasue some other hotels have similiar name as ANGEL'S GARDEN, ANGELOS HOME, , but the Angel's home Hotel - Sultanhemet was the oldest one The hotel which i have stayed ANGEL'S HOME HOTEL - SUILANAHMET has great location with very friendly and helpfull staff.I was satisfied what i paid for the service and the room i booked. I recommend Angel's home hotel - sultanahmet

Reviews.Title: “enjoyable stay !!!!”
Reviews.Author: sam13000
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Istanbul and Angel's Home was a great place to start....We've stayed one week. The weather was quite cold in March, but we were glad of the warm cosy room...It was clean, well maintained throuhout our stay. The staff were incredibly helpful and pleasant. The hotel is well located in the Sultanhamet area. I would absolutly recommend Angel's home, we just love it...!!!! From now on, it is our home in this wonderful city !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel in the historic heart of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Bryant_11
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for 12 days in March, 2011. This was not our first stay here as we come to Turkey on a regular basis and always stay at the Angel's Home. We like the people who own the hotel and the staff are always friendly and helpful. The views from the roof terrace are spectacular and the Blue Mosque is so close that it looks like a large garden ornament in the back yard. You can walk to everything and there are excellent restaurants very close to the hotel. Rates are very reasonable for the historic region of a major city in Europe. The hotel will be undergoing renovations in the next year to add some rooms and freshen up the existing ones. The street is very quiet and the rooms are air-conditioned. The showers are very powerful with abundant hot water and the breakfasts that are included in the price are substantial. We missed quite a few of them as we were often out very late with Turkish friends sampling Raki and listening to Turkish music.

Reviews.Title: “SMILE:)”
Reviews.Author: arose25
Reviews.Content: within walking distance to many historical places like blue mosque, haga soyfa, topkapi , grand bazaar and hop-no-off starting point. Also close to tram station for trip to other area of interests. Staff during breakfast was friendly. room was clean and tidy throughout my stay. Very nice location. Thank you Angels see you next year.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, good service and very central”
Reviews.Author: Chelsea1950
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay service was very friendly, got good advice about where to go and what to do which resulted in a good experience. Rooms are clean and good for a city break hotel has character I would recommend it to a friend and if I visit Istanbul again would certainly book Angel Home again, did not eat in the hotel breakfast was ok, roof terrace has very good views.

Reviews.Title: “Cosy hotel and harley man”
Reviews.Author: korebe
Reviews.Content: I have just back from this cosy hotel.It has a realy perfect location.Nice and comfortable rooms , very friendly staff made our stay enjoyable.Especially the owner harley man :) Hakan was very friendly to all guest with his personaly recommendations during our stay in Istanbul.The hotel is very close to the all main monuments for tourist. We will certanly back to this cosy place if we get a chance again.Istanbul is great city.Topkapi palace,ayasofia and the bbosphorus should be seen. Grand bazaar is nice to visit but not for shoping.Totaly touristy except jewellery and gold.Finally Istanbul is a racing star city,should be seen.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice location and friendly service!”
Reviews.Author: selimyegenoglu
Reviews.Content: I steyed in this hotel at the begining of March. It has very good location, so close to museum, Blue mosque and Ayasofia, and also near to the seaside. All staff are friendly and smiling. Well decorated room is clean, always hot water, tv and aircondition, and very good breakfast on the terrace with a wonderful sea view. .I will say my friends for staying in this hotel and hope to be there again.

Reviews.Title: “An ok value for money”
Reviews.Author: UnaUna1
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this little hotel is its location, as is the case actually with all the little family run hotels in the Sultanahmet area. It is quite clean, but the thing I did not like about it was the ever present smell of cat urine all over the restaurant (inside) and the fact that cats are there around your feet as you are eating

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: PriincessB
Reviews.Content: A cozy and romantic hotel with a perfect location. Good service and kind personal. Near to Istanbuls historic areas. Its a hotel where you can feel like home. I would absolutely recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Cosy, comfortable hotel with helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: VaughanJones
Reviews.Content: Just enjoyed a few nights at the Angel's Home hotel and found the staff incredibly helpful and pleasant in every respect. The hotel is family run and extremely close to all the main attractions of the Old Town (Sultanhamet). The breakfast was varied and plentiful and as the weather was quite cold in February we were glad of the warm, cosy room. Free internet access just outside our bedroom door was a bonus. We found the hotel good value for money and an ideal location for seeing the main sights. Istanbul is a city that never sleeps so when staying anywhere centrally, there are bound to be the sounds of life going on at all hours of the day and night but I wouldn't say that noise was an issue in this hotel any more than other hotels in the same area.

Reviews.Title: “Cheerful and excellent value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Chami08
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel in October 2009, and found it excellent value for money. It's very conveniently located, within a few minutes walking of the historical sites of Istanbul, and a multitude of (tourist) restaurants nearby. The room I had was at the front of the hotel - I would describe the room as okay as the decor and bathroom was quite old and dated. I had a problem with the tv aerial, which was fixed very quickly and the service in general was excellent. I loved the breakfast!! They had some really good choices. I had a wonderful time in Istanbul, and no doubt part of that was due to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Qualified as hotel satisfied as a home”
Reviews.Author: guizino
Reviews.Content: Almost a year ago our friends had stayed at Angelshome.They were very happy with all. A year later we had a wonderful stay at the same hotel.The date we chosed to stay was in low season with very reasonable rate for the money we paid also free transportation was in. The hotel has great location.easy to ferry , light tram and aslo to the airport.. For a short term stay,Sultanahmet is best place ,Angelshome hotel is good choise

Reviews.Title: “What else need for a hotel”
Reviews.Author: bikeramt
Reviews.Content: I steyed in this hotel one week ago.Very good location ,very near to museum,Blue mosque and Ayasofia.Very near to seaside to walk everymorning.Personal working hotel are friendly and smiling.Room is clean, always hot water and very good breakfast on the terace.I stayed in cheap room but also it is good.I will say my friends for staying in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Dont go there!”
Reviews.Author: kelani1947
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Angels Home Hotel and wondered who wrote the reviews on TA.Clean ?Tidy?Freindly?What a joke.Room was the Angel suite -supposedly one their best! -dusty and grubby.The shower didn't drain properly so you stood in puddle.Large curtains could not be drawn in the bedroom as they fell of the track. Fire exit doors not maintained so smoke would have been channeled up to the room . Wallpaper peeling off.Fell over threadbear carpet leading to the terrace. We were offered to change room or another of their properties,but as we were supposedly in one of their best -we took the only option and moved out. Owner became aggressive when we asked to pay for just the 2 nights instead of the 5 we had prepaid.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: MIKEWinchester
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th stay at Angels Home and we look forward to future visits.

Reviews.Title: “As honest and clear as could be”
Reviews.Author: aspera967
Reviews.Content: I found the hotel by TA.The recommendadtions were decided me to book with this hotel.Emailed them, got a reply in vey long but clealy explained for all details even for the discounts.The replies were very sure of their business.It might be the reason to choose the hotel.Now am at home and very satisfied with Angelshome hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Extremly good to stay..”
Reviews.Author: Ipekbinatli
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend have stayed at Angel's Home for 4 nights before 2 weeks. We had a nice room decorated well with all facilities. They were serving breakfast at terrace with a wonderful sea view for relaxing and begining to a good day :) We loved it. Location of Angel's Home was brilliant, we walked to the square where is Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and tram station to go to modern part called Taksim, just in 5 min. It called as a hotel but it was like home for us by the way of friendly and helpful staff. Hope to stay at Angel's Home again..

Reviews.Title: “One of the best i have stayed”
Reviews.Author: gamixtun
Reviews.Content: The hotel Angel's home i stayed was one of the best during our trip in Turkey.We had no direct flight to Chanakkali nd Troy thats why stayed in Istanbul for 4 nights then moved to the west of the country renting a car.The reception staff and the hotel owners (duyar brothers) were so kind and helpfull to arrange our trip. Well now some about the hotel.Perfect location a breat away from Hagiasofia ,Bluemosque and Grand bazaar. -Nice and comfortable rooms. -full equipped ensuite bathroom ,high pressure water -tv,ac,minibar fulled with very reasonable rates -free pick up service and also return transportation costs only 10 lira And one of the best..breakfast at the rooftop terrace Shakil and alex,thanks guys Brothers, also a great thank to u.

Reviews.Title: “Worth we paid”
Reviews.Author: truker
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself has a great location.Just a breth away fron the thousands oh years history, blue mosque,ayasofia and topkapi palace..Quite,safe and friendly.The price of the rooms were absolutely the worth we paid.The breakfast serving at the terrace with incredible view of the blue mosque and marmara sea ,princes islands. The staff were so helpful.Rooms were clean and fully equiped ,bathrobe,tootbrush,shampoo and all.Non stop hot water,a.c and multi channel tv also a part of the comfort of the rooms. Highly recommend the Angelshome for the travellers looking for a heart located at the centre of the city Sure stay at the hotel if have a chance to back to Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “excellent job:)”
Reviews.Author: juli18
Reviews.Content: my first holiday to abroad.completley,everthing was excellent.otel is centrel of sultanahmet.you could visit the suleymaniye mosque and sultanahmet mosquie.if you decide go to the turkiye you will stay this hotel.and said hello for us own the hotel and stuff.have nice holiday.cheer up:)

Reviews.Title: “Luxury and comfort in friendly atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: Therese186534
Reviews.Content: Small but luxurious cosy hotel in a quiet street but very close the Istanbul's major attractions (Agya Sophia and Blue Mosque), to a variety of restaurants and to the tramway to other parts. The staff was very helpful at all times.

Reviews.Title: “My favorite hotel in my favorite city”
Reviews.Author: roamingworld
Reviews.Content: Actually, my last stay at the Angel's Home was in August 2009, but I selected an earlier date so I can write this review. I have stayed in this hotel alone and with my husband on three separate trips and every time it felt like home. The staff is friendly and helpful, the rooms are pleasant and clean but most of all I love the hotel's terrace with its excellent views of the sea, the Blue mosque and Hagia Sophia. The hotel is quiet and yet right at the heart of the Sultanahmet area, it's A/C works perfectly in the summer heat of Istanbul. I am planning a trip to Istanbul next year and I am even going to change the date of my trip so I can afford to stay in this hotel again. I wish they gave discount for return travelers but this will not stop me from choosing Angel's home every time I return to my favorite city-Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: GD_JD
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend stayed at the beginning of October for only 4 days and each day were worth it. The place looks very nice for a three star hotel! As we got there the receptionist welcomed and happily introduced himself. He kindly proposed us few things that we can do in Istanbul like the boat cruise and the Turkish bath which we did and had so much fun! Then we got sent to our room with the help of a porter. The double room was very presentable and comfortable thanks to the air conditioner when we felt hot/cold =). For dinner we asked the receptionist for a good restaurant and shisha place, his recommendation were really good! The price is very good and we fully enjoyed our time there although we had a very short time holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, so-so hotel”
Reviews.Author: jtrif1
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel because it was the only thing available this weekend in the Blue Mosque area and it got good reviews on tripadvisor.....the staff is nice but the rooms are so so, for the price the place is pretty expensive (this is high season).....all of the hearts and angels are a little corny though I guess some people might like it. I think there are better places in the area for the same price it you book ahead of time...also, our room was facing the street on the 2nd level and it was pretty loud, noise easily carried through the windows from people and vehicles. Not the quietest place in the world. The place is not terrible but I would stay somewhere else next time....

Reviews.Title: “I hope this will be helpful”
Reviews.Author: leon_pug
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Angelshome hotel for some days for trip to Istanbul and found the hotel by TA.The location was the main reason to look for a place to stay.We knew that Istanbul was a huge city.The hotel should be at the centre to reach to the main attractions as museums,mosques and also easy to reach to the other places of the city. I can easyl says that the hotel has a great location. The rooms were comfortable,toiletiers ,sleepers,bathrobe.All details were thoght and good quaity. The staff were so friendly and helpfull.Breakfast was serving at the terrace with incredible view. The hotel is in two buildings.Both were old and historical.The main building with deluxe rooms and the sister Hotel Peripetie with standard rooms. We stayed at deluxe rooms even paid more than standards. Some more than our reservation we asked for available room but both hotels were fully booked.The owners Duyar brothers adviced us to ask just after our return and promised to do their best and they did.Although they do not accept 1 night stay,they gave us a room standard type at Peripetie.The ,toiletiers ,sleepers,bathrobe quaity were as same as at Angelshome but the rooms was smaller with its lower rate. Finally we recommend the both.Great location for tourists.

Reviews.Title: “1 woche im Angel's home hotel”
Reviews.Author: alpla
Reviews.Content: wir waren 1 woche im august bei Angels's home.Unser zimmer waren sehr sauber und confortabel es wahr sehr luxerios. Der personal ins besonders Shakir ward sehr freund lich und hilfs bereit und hat uns sehr gut Ger ahen das Hotel ist in ein sehr guhe lage in der nahe ist die ansehlich keiten z.b. Mosches,museum und Bazaren. Wir wurden den Hotelk Angels home weilter en felen.

Reviews.Title: “brilliant hotel in a beautiful location :D”
Reviews.Author: lu1986
Reviews.Content: just returned home after spending 5 nights at the angels home hotel. we arrived during the day and were greeted happily by the hotel staff, they were very welcoming especially shakir, he was on hand to provide us with any queries that we had and also with the sights to see within the city...which is only a short distance away. our room was one of the deluxe rooms and was spacious, the maid came daily so the room remain extremely clean. breakfast was a typical turkish breakfast which was lovely and fresh.. i would definately recommend this hotel , it is a 5* in my books, the staff especially made our stay!!! will be going to istanbul next year and will 100% stay at this hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, great rooms,great price..best location”
Reviews.Author: s0nur
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd time in istanbul but 1st at angelshome.Comparing with previous hotels we stayed, angelshome was definetly good with its service , room quality,staff and sure the rate.nothing necerssary to say soemthing about the location because all previous rewievs were saying the same.Absolutely we will recommend the Angelshome and sure back if have a chance to be in Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Apartment review - make sure you know what you are getting into”
Reviews.Author: naqvi_m
Reviews.Content: apartment is 5 min walk from main hotel, in the middle of a local area. local vegetable and other shops right next to entrance, lots of cats. no lift. plus: 10 min walk from Blue mosque, good size, kitchen, helpful staff negative: location, overall standard quite poor, breakfast on the whole we enjoyed our stay, but were not expecting the apt to be in the location it was. would not return

Reviews.Title: “Cosy hotel at an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Serkan_Ankara
Reviews.Content: Angel's home is located at an excellent spot, less than 10 min walk to Sultanahmet square where the main tourist attractions such as Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Basilica Cistern are. There you can also take the tram by which you can get to other parts of the city easily. The surroundings of the hotel are full of restaurants and pubs, but this does not discomfort you. The hotel has 2 buildings, some 50 m from each other. We stayed in the one closer to Sultanahmet square. The hotel is cosy, with a small lobby and a restaurant at the entrance where they also serve breakfast. Breakfast is OK, but I'd prefer that they had more varieties. The rooms can be considered small, but as far as I know all the hotels in the surroundings have similar sized rooms. Bathroom was large and clean enough and surprisingly there are toothbrush, toothpaste, shaving cream, deodorants for man and woman. We enjoyed our stay in Angel's home and were not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place but there are cheaper, better places to stay nearby”
Reviews.Author: Narmak
Reviews.Content: Synopsis (Overall + Value) Solid hotel, near the main sights, friendly staff, but old rooms and lack of "extras" mean that other hotels are a better option. (We moved on to stay at Deniz Houses, nearby.) Location 5-10minutes walk from the Blue Mosque etc - well places away from the noisy streets but close enough to the action. Hotel Room Meant to be a twin room, it was a little cramped. There was an old, small TV in the corner, and the bathroom was slightly cramped too. Anyone "large" or very tall would struggle to have moving space in the shower cubicle. There was also some mould on the ceiling, but this didn't affect our stay at all. There wasn't much "leg room" on the toilet seat as it was very close to the wall. Bed Comfortable and no problems. Staff Friendly, spoke reasonable English at best, always cheerful and helpful. Internet/Wifi There is wifi coverage throughout the hotel, there is also a PC on the first floor - all free to use. Housekeeping Daily service, well kept. The water in the room is not free, they charged us 2TL per bottle. We assumed it was free. Breakfast This was a negative. It was included but wasn't very good at all. They only had small pieces of bread (no turkish bread/toast), their 2 cold drinks were disgusting (meant to be orange and something else) and they only did one type of egg. There was no English tea available. However, there was a nice greenhouse-type area to eat which was pleasant. Airport transfer They collected us on time, and it was a good pickup service. Other The roof terrace was being renovated sadly, so we didn't get to see it. During the day, it can get noisy if you have a front facing room - luckily we were out most days and by night time things had quietened down. We flew to Dalaman and back to Istanbul, the second time we opted to stay in Deniz Houses instead - which worked out better and cheaper.

Reviews.Title: “<hotel with very good location !”
Reviews.Author: drogba111
Reviews.Content: Last year in december i was in istanbul at the angels home hotel. i live in germany and i wanted to make a trip to istanbul with my wife. we googled and found the angels home hotel in sultan ahmet. it has a excellent location near the popular hagui sophia. It is near to the metro staion (train) so you can get very fast to everywhere in istanbul. the service is very very good. the roomservice and the meal is very good to. so if you want to make a trip to istanbul, stay there !

Reviews.Title: “one week like a dream”
Reviews.Author: erdemyzc
Reviews.Content: I've been there for one weekwith my family.At the end of this week nobody would go back.The location of hotel is really perfect so we could go everywhere by walk.Also the staff is very frienldy.We met there the bosses Hakan and Okan brothers.They are really very nice and cordial.If you have any problem, you muss go them.I'm sure that they will solve your problem. Having breakfast in AngelsHome was a pleasure for us also you muss have dinner there.Their food and service are perfect. Finally i want say just one thing.If you stay at Angelshome,you wont be repentant.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location , friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: oglcmz
Reviews.Content: We have just bck to home from home called angelshome.It has perfect location and very friendly staff.The room we have booked was standard.It was not big but enough. Fully equiped with toiletiers and also the room has ac,minibar , etc.The breakfast was easy but fresh.We recommend the hotel especialy for its location.Free transportation for both ways was also the reason to choose the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location”
Reviews.Author: Franzob
Reviews.Content: Very good service and very good location ! a few minutes to the "metro station", where you can get everywhere in Istanbul^^ The owner of angels home gives you the best service. If yopu need a taxi or something else like some information about hirstorical things in Istanbul, he answers every question. The Eat was very good and the rooms very clean ! The hotel has a nice atmosphere you can really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: “The reason i booked”
Reviews.Author: okyantx
Reviews.Content: Dear all. I want to post the review to help the others who look a hotel to stay. Here are the reasons i choosed Angelshome. 1-great location.very close to the main points for tourists.i did not need any taxi or guide or more time to reach to the most importatnt places. 2-great room rate.i compared the rates and angelshome rates was the reasonable one comparing the servicei got. 3-free both ways transportation. Angelshome was the only hotel offered free transportation now what i found. 1-the room was definetly i choosed at the web site 2-there are two buildings .one with thelux rooms and terrace the other one is only few steps away where serving the breakfast at the garden coverd with glass top 3-free transportation was good but return transportation is by shuttle arrenged by the hotel in regular hours. 4-payment better to be in cash otherwise currency exchange rate difference should be paid. 5-roof teracce is open for all guest evet if you stay in the other building. and finally.the staff is wonderful. i felt myself as own my home. the hotel itself is not high class but easy and serve all what a torist need . as all do i spend just few hours in the room and rest was out . i recommend the hotel if your are not expecting few stars service or rooms etc..

Reviews.Title: “Great value, amazing service!”
Reviews.Author: Tonystark54
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with the rooms, the location, the breakfast and most of all the wonderful service we received. The staff is really superb and made us feel like we were close friends. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “why u look for another ...”
Reviews.Author: hunatalay
Reviews.Content: that was the first holiday in istanbul and undrestood that was the best choice for my family... we have been many country many cities but we can say that angels home hotel was the best location and best family hotel we have stayed in... also we have to say you can not feel who is staff and who is owner... you feel everybody in the hotel working there and also you feel everybody is your friend there... rooms are comfortable and very clean... also while we are there we have compaired the price of the other hotels as their locations and rooms and understood that we were very lucky that choosed ANGEL'S HOME by chance... thank u hakan and okan BROTHERS...

Reviews.Title: “excellent locatioan combines with great hospitality”
Reviews.Author: slen_10
Reviews.Content: this nice hotel locates the heart of the city.. rooms are so comfortable also service is gratify. totally worths to what you pay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: Ananda777
Reviews.Content: We had a lovely stay here and would definately stay again. Very clean, great location and nice staff. The breakfast was good and it was very nice to have robes and slippers provided in the room. This hotel really is excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: Family01
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel was perfect and in easy walking distance to all the main attractions. Booked direct with the hotel and had transportation to and from the airport included in the rate. Stayed in the angel suite which was clean and bed was comfortable. Staff friendly especially Alex who took time to tell us places to visit. Breakfast was good....it was served at another building round the corner but a short stroll before breakfast was fine. If I had one criticism it would be the attention to detail for instance our sink pedestal still had the bar code stickers, the wallpaper was lifting at the seams in some places and the paintwork around the balcony was a bit amateur . Small things that didn't spoil our stay but wouldn't have taken much to sort out. If you like traditional style and something different to the usual modern hotel then this would suit.

Reviews.Title: “We were sad to leave the family”
Reviews.Author: nadineby
Reviews.Content: It is easly couble be said that ''home away home'' for Angelshome.We found the hotel seaching a place located at the heart of the old town and decided to stay at Angelshome because of its reasonable rates and the previous reviews although some of them were not ok. I can easly say that we had no any negatives. all was finei easy and cosy hotel with charming rooms very very friendly staff.Also as a motorcycle rider owner of Angelshome should be met him and the bike should be seen. :) We booked by a travel agent for a standard room. according to your budget try to book directly to the hotel to be able to choose the room and get free both ways transportation. The location of the hotel is just perfect. The call to pray from the mosque is every morning wakes u up.no need to set your clock up :) well many things to say about the hotel which are totaly good and excelent. Meeting Hakan was one of the best part of our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff”
Reviews.Author: guvenir
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Angelshome for a week. Booked thrugh to the hotel to get both ways free transportation ans also for a deluxe room because both services were not available if we had booked by a travel agent.I can easyly say that it was the worth we paid. higly recommend Angelshome, very friendly staff , clean and fully equiped bathrooms, clean, and good service. But the best thing was the location. If we have chance to bact to istanbul, sure we will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “one of the best place i stop ever ;-)”
Reviews.Author: hkempfert
Reviews.Content: Hi Folks, i am Hendrik and on a 6 month sabbaticaltrip with motorbike from Hamburg (Germany) down to Cape Town (South Africa). I stopped for 3 Days in istanbul. My hotel was the "angels home" at sultanahmet district. A wonderful, peaceful and lovely place to stay! Hakan and his team supports me in all my questions any time. Also when my motorbike need a little service, Hakan spent half a day to bring me to his mechanic to fix my problems. It was 20km far away and an intressting trip to get to Ersoy's Servicestation. When i further has to make the next stop anytime at istanbul, my first try ist to get a stay at angeshome ! Hakan, you're the best Host ever ! best regards Hendrik follow my charitytrip on www.socialwaydown.org or on twitter or on facebook :-)

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: chev13
Reviews.Content: The first major thing to know before making your way to the hotel is that there are two of them (or two parts, if you will), but one is just around the corner from the other so you won't have too much of a problem. The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance of all the main Sultanahmet attractions - Ayasofya, Blue Mosque, Basilica Cistern are about a five minute walk from the hotel, Cemberlitas Turkish bath and the Grand Bazaar are about a ten minute walk. The Sultanahmet metro station is also close if you'd like to explore other attractions. There are many restaurants nearby as well with fantastic food! The staff at the hotel are very friendly and helpful. They were probably the best part of our experience at Angel's Home. They were always good at giving us directions - and pamphlets - for attractions around the city and they even put on Premiere League football games in the lobby for us when we really didn't want to miss a couple big games. We had to walk to the other Angel's Home for breakfast and it was alright. It wasn't too fancy, but it had enough selection for us to be satisfied. Just beware that the freshly squeezed juices are not included in the price, which we found out after the fact. However, the staff here were very pleasant so it wasn't so bad. The cleanliness of Angel's Home was generally pretty good. The only complaint I have was that our pillows had some black stains on them when we first arrived. Room service came in every day to tidy up so it was usually in good condition.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location, great service, great experience!”
Reviews.Author: modesto2
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I just spent four nights in Istanbul and used Angel's Home Hotel for our accommodations. We had a great experience! The location is absolutely perfect - about a two minute walk to the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. It's situated on a "cute" street with some shops and restaurants. It was great to start and end each day with fantastic views of the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. The hotel staff spoke very good English and was very helpful in securing airport transportation and booking tickets to the whirling dervishes. The morning breakfast was great! Plenty of food options, hot eggs, and much more. I highly recommend this hotel for affordable and perfectly-located accommodations in the great city of Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: Tatilde
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a five night stay at the Angel's Home Hotel. The hotel is very conveniently situated for the main attractions of Istanbul, and some very good restaurants. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed a good breakfast each morning. Would recommend this hotel and Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Angels Home Hotel & Istanbul!”
Reviews.Author: vikkibuckley1972
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Istanbul, we had seen Angels Hotel online and booked it direct meaning we got a free airport transfer, which was fantastic! The hotel is just lovely, staff so helpful, Sakir on Reception was brilliant, so friendly and helpful, he helped make our holiday! The hotel itself is fantastic, we were lucky enough to stay in the penthouse, the views over the Bosphorous were amazing. The roof terrace in the warmer weather would be just perfect, I need to visit again in the summer! We loved Istanbul, such an amazing historical city, can't wait to visit again, 4 days wasn't long enough, will definitely be visiting Angels Hotel again too, cannot recommend this hotel highly enough.

Reviews.Title: “Small charming hotel”
Reviews.Author: joisEdinburgh
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much. Great location, less than five minute walk to Blue Mosque and other historical attractions. Could not have picked a better place to stay. Plenty nice restaurants in vicinity. Hotel staff friendly and helpful especially Sekir. Would definitely recommend this hotel for location and comfort. Hopefully return soon.

Reviews.Title: “Read more than just the good reviews before deciding on this hotel”
Reviews.Author: LadybirdinLondon
Reviews.Content: Sure, this place gets some very good reviews but I would thoroughly recommend reading some of the not so good accounts before deciding on this hotel. As said by another reviewer, it's really quite weird.. I was traveling with my mum.. we were given a room that I can only describe as Bordello style.. red sheets, red satin duvet, red satin heart cushions etc etc.. very heavy and oppressive. The breakfast was very average and was located upstairs on a rooftop covered in astroturf with cat poo scattered around the place. All in all, just not enjoyable. You could do much much better than the Angel's home hotel...

Reviews.Title: “magical hotel”
Reviews.Author: oneIran
Reviews.Content: Dear travelers I am sensitive about everything especially when it is about trip. I have been staying to many 5 star hotels and famous ones, but every time we went there we had some complains about rooms, stuffs, food, rude behavior,â€¦ so when we decided to come to Istanbul I told to my husband we will not reserve a room until I see the hotel's room with my own eyes. My cousin had been to Turkey and he had stayed in Angle's home Hotel. So he made me certain that Angel's home hotel is the ideal place for me, but I preferred see the hotel with my own eyes. We made that big risk and just took the plane to Istanbul. Our plan was to see first Angle and then search other hotels one by one. I had been searching hotels for one month in internet and I had the hotel addresses and I had been reading many reviews about them. So we reached the hotel, our first encounter was with Hakan, hotel owner and chief Sakir. Talking with Sakir was as if I have seen my brother who is so kind and wants to make everything all right for us. Angel's home hotel has 2 buildings in the same street. So Sakir and we went upstairs and downstairs to each building and I saw some rooms. As I told you before I am very sensitive about everything, I couldn't make choice so I asked Sakir again and again we went upstairs and downstairs. I checked everything, beds, bathrooms, and the cleanliness of the room. Everything seemed all right for me, so we decided to stay at Angle for 8 nights. In my heart I was worry a little because although I checked everything but I was not completely sure about it, but when we stayed one night I understood it was the hotel I wanted to stay on Istanbul and I was lucky that my first choice was the best. We stayed 3 nights at penthouse. Wow! What a view of the sea! We stayed 5 nights at deluxe room. It was so nice, clean, hot water (in winter); everything in the room was comfortable. Every day when we came back in the evening, we were happy to return to a very romantic and nice room. Nice hotel, nice room, beautiful lobby, very warm and friendly stuffs made our journey magical. Next time, if I want to go to Istanbul, defiantly I will choose Angel's home hotel again. They treat their gusts as a member of their family. They put a lot of respect to the guest needs and problems. At the end I want to thank Hakan, his brother Okan, chief Sakir, chief Tekin and other stuffs whom were very so nice and friendly but I donâ€™t know their names. If you stay at Angle hotel you are very near to all the important historical monuments, blue mosque, ayasofya, grand bazaar, and there is tramway station near. You can go to many places. My advice to you is: if you want your journey to be economical don't go to travel agencies. The tour they suggest is very expensive. You can go by yourself and explore the city. It is so much cheaper. Near Angel's hotel, in front of Blue mosque is Sultanahmet Street. From Sultanahmet you can go by tramway to Eninonu (the port). There are many ships there. They took you for six hours tour to black sea; the price is just 20 TL for each. They took you to a very nice village. On the top of the village is a ruined castle. What a view from there! If you went there I recommend you to eat fish, so yummy!!! From sultanahmet you can go by tramway to Aksaray. In Aksaray go to Metro, it goes till the Ataturk airport. The price of tramway and metro for each person is one and half TL. We have seen two nice malls in Istanbul (cevahir mall and forum Istanbul) you can go there just by tramway or metro or bus. The transportation in Istanbul is very easy and economic. If everybody has any questions I am willing to answer them. Here is my email address: [--]

Reviews.Title: “What a romantic, great situated, nice hotel. An absolute must!”
Reviews.Author: fransenester
Reviews.Content: What a romantic, great situated, nice hotel. An absolute must! greetings Frans en Ester Vromans

Reviews.Title: “I DID NOT EVEN GET TO STAY THERE”
Reviews.Author: mmmm75
Reviews.Content: I confirmed my bookings about a week ago and all arrangements were made. BUT they just send me an email to cancel my books, plainly because they decided to give my room to travel agents. I think it is totally unprofessional, so beware if you are booking with them, you better have a good back-up plan!

Reviews.Title: “I want to say that Iike this hotel (angelshome hotel)”
Reviews.Author: emir34
Reviews.Content: either this hotel is quality or it is chea. it is also very comfortable.I like its service. the environment of the hotel is very nice and suitable ( I like the boss because of being helpful :):):)...he is a very kind man ) Our days which we stay are realy wonderfull

Reviews.Title: “excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: DCMLondon
Reviews.Content: It is not a five star hotel but for the price you pay you cannot ask for more. Staff is attentive and friendly. Rooms are very clean and bathroom spacious and clean. Nice details like bathrobe and sleepers. It is two minutes to the center of the city and the TRAM. Nice and varied breakfast. Only two small criticisms: The central heating cannot be switched off during the night and it was a bit too hot. Bear this in mind if you go on winter. We were asked to pay as soon as we arrived and a couple of days after. They were not pushing for it but it made us feel a bit uncomfortable. We paid two days before leaving without any problems. I would really recommend this hotel for its value for money and location. If it wasnâ€™t for those minor problems I would have rated 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money. Amazing location”
Reviews.Author: nothing_but_blue
Reviews.Content: We booked our triple share room direct with the hotel with no issues. We received a free transfer to and from the airport which saved us 8 euro per person. The staff were friendly and helpful. The room was comfortable and clean. The breakfast was both western and continental. The location is particularly good being very close to the blue mosque and all the sights of sultanahmet. Overall our stay was very pleasant and great value for money . We would recommend angels home to anyone looking for mid range accomodation.

Reviews.Title: “romantic and friendly atmosphere beside the Blue Mosque”
Reviews.Author: prometeo57
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean and the room was great! Huge bed and quiet atmosphere. Staff is polite and helpful. Breakfast choice could be improved. I would strongly recommend this Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: helene00
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in Istanbul ! Angel's Home is very well situated, just a few metres away from the main sights, and the staff are all very nice and helpful. When we go back to Istanbul, we will definitely stay at Angel's Home again to enjoy the terrace in the summer !

Reviews.Title: “More romantic then Paris”
Reviews.Author: arjanboelsma
Reviews.Content: We just came home from a 4 day trip to Istanbul. Thanks to the advise -we found on the internet- from other travellers, we found the Angel's home hotel. What a great hotel it was. We got the most romantic room in Ottaman style. The hotel is situated in the best part of Istanbul (Sultanahmet). You wll find all the main sights at walkingdistance and in the street there are very nice restaurants like Metropolis which we would really recommend. The staff of the hotel is very helpfull (not in a commercial way they are truly helpfull!!) and the rooms are clean. For a three star hotel they offer you much more then they have to. Like bathrobes, slippers, free internet access etc, etc. Also the breakfast is very nice and complete. This a hotel i would recommend to everyone who wants to have a great (romantic) time in beautiful Istanbul!!!

Reviews.Title: “A Well Situated and Affordable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cmf4mea
Reviews.Content: Angels is not exactly what I anticipated after seeing the pictures. The location is superb ( a short walk to the Blue Mosque and the tram) and the price is excellent. We stayed in the cheaper location and found the linens clean and there were robes and slippers in the rooms. Free internet TV etc. Breakfast was OK but we did go to (I apologise) McDonalds a couple of times. The staff was friendly and helpful. Transfers to the airport were a great help. My only suggestions would be that there needed to be a little more dusting/cleaning in the halls and rooms and that the young men working there needed a bit more supervision. In all fairness we were there at the end of Ramadan ant the owners were away. I would go there again just for the convenience and general friendly atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “Quaint boutique hotel in a superb location”
Reviews.Author: AGibToronto
Reviews.Content: I travelled as a father with two young daughters (ages 11, 10). We had stayed here in 2007 and were satisfied enough to return in 2009. We stayed here for 5 nights while en route to Antalya, Turkey. Note that there are 2 locations about 1 block apart. We stayed at the less fancy location - Mimar Mehmet Aga Cad. No: 35. The hotel is quaint - an old, 3-storey house. Facilities are very clean and relatively basic, e.g. no elevator, no swimming pool or fitness center, small TV in the room. Nevertheless, there are reasonable amenities included, e.g. air conditioning / heat / wireless internet / mini fridge / toiletries / slippers / robe in every room, and a reasonable breakfast is included (lunch and dinner are extra). You can also get free transfer from the airport, and back to the airport, depending on the length of stay, and a 20% discount on the daily rate for pre-payment. Best of all is the location - within walking distance (from a few hundred feet to about 1 mile) to major attractions in the Sultanahmet district - Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Hippodrome, Basilica Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar. Also within walking distance of many restaurants and souvenir shops.

Reviews.Title: “Angel's Home - A cosy home”
Reviews.Author: psarapsych
Reviews.Content: If you want to be within rolling out of bed distance to all the main sights then this is the place to be. Angel's Home Hotel is quirky, cosy and has a slightly naive charm about it. Master 'Good Morning' and 'Thank you' in Turkish at least, if you can, and you will find the staff respond with gratitude that you have at least tried. We certainly had a very happy time at this hotel and would return. If you want slick front desk staff with perfect English, forget it, this is NOT a Best Western catering to anyone who wants their own home in a foreign land! Make the effort to enjoy the hotel and the staff and you will have a happy time here. Everything is VERY clean and if you need ANYTHING sorted out for you, the staff are always happy to help out. Come to this hotel expecting Turkish hospitality NOT frothy Cappucinos for breakfast! You won't find them but there is a huge urn of Turkish tea on the go and a varied buffet breakfast to keep you going! We took deluxe rooms and had a memorable and VERY comfortable stay. THANK YOU everyone at Angel's Home for looking after us so well :Â¬)

Reviews.Title: “Three-star hotel, five-star service”
Reviews.Author: ChrisMAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Angel's Home hotel for five very enjoyable days in October 2009. Overall, it offers great value for money. Yes, it might be possible to quibble over the decor (which is 'eclectic' and a little shabby in places), but that's all. If you want marble halls and crystal chandeliers, look elsewhere (and get a life!) The location is ideal within easy walking distance of the main sights and transport links. My room (a standard room on the second floor) was very clean and reasonably quiet.
